channel.title: undefined - Dietrich Ayala
channel.description: Internet freedom, the web and Mozilla.

item.title: Interesting Papers by Stephen Mazzocchi
item.description:
Several papers relating to XML from this Cocoon developer and Apache Group member. Examples:

  • Enabling Semantic Searching

  • Reducing The Effects Of Growth Saturation With The Adoption Of A Publishing Framework Based On XML Technologies

  • Adding XML Capabilities with CocoonLink
item.dc:creator: Dietrich Ayala

item.title: Building Taxonomies (MS Press, via IA)
item.description: "Building taxonomies. Chapter 6 of Susan Conway's and Char Sligar's book Unlocking Knowledge Assets is available on Microsoft Press' site. The chapter entitled "Building Taxonomies" defines what taxonomies are, how they play a role in content management and how to build and maintain them."Link
item.dc:creator: Dietrich Ayala

item.title: Wyona: Open Source XML CMS
item.description: "Wyona is just an Interpreter of XML, not just users data, such as for instance articles, press-releases, addresses, but also regarding functionalities, such as for instance access controlling (ACML), workflow management (WFML) and revision controlling (RCML). The concept is similar to the one of a "HTML-Browser". You should be able to switch the Content Management System at any time (who said that?). The network is the Content Management System."Link
item.dc:creator: Dietrich Ayala
